sentences.english: During this period of 6 years, he quelled the nationalities' Risingup in Yunnan successfully.
sentences.chinese: 其間，他成功地鎮壓了滇東北各族人民起義。

sentences.english: Jialize wetland is one typical marsh in the middle area of Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 嵩明縣的嘉麗澤溼地是滇中典型的沼澤溼地。

sentences.english: Central Yunnan province is an economically developed area of Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 滇中地區是雲南省經濟發達的地區。

sentences.english: Object To identify Magnolia officinal and Campbell magnolia.
sentences.chinese: 目的對厚朴和滇藏木蘭進行鑑別。

sentences.english: The shell-storage containers used by the ancient Dian people are bronze containers for storing shell-money.
sentences.chinese: 貯貝器是古滇人專門用於貯放貝幣的銅鑄容器。

sentences.english: The Pre-Sinian Darezha Formation is widely exposed in west Mianning.
sentences.chinese: 冕寧西部是康滇地區前震旦系出露較集中的地段之一。

sentences.english: The two parts of anomalies show the difference between shallow and deep tectonics.
sentences.chinese: 兩部分異常顯示出川滇地區深部與淺部的構造差異。

sentences.english: Middle the Kang Yunnan earth axis sticks out for the anteklise, big area appearing platform basis.
sentences.chinese: 康滇地軸中部爲臺背斜隆起，大面積出露地臺基底。

sentences.english: Conclusion was that Yunnan City Group was still in the early stages of urban agglomeration.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，滇中城市羣尚處於城市羣發育的初期階段。

sentences.english: The Yuhucun Formation in NE Yunnan is an important horizon bearing high grade Pb Zn deposit.
sentences.chinese: 漁戶村組爲滇東北富鉛鋅礦牀的重要產出層位。

sentences.english: The Etouchang-type iron deposit is a typical stratabound deposit in the northern part of central Yunnan.
sentences.chinese: 滇中北部的鵝頭廠式鐵礦是一種典型的層控礦牀。

sentences.english: The Quercus forest in the Northwest of Yunnan Province showed a strong sprouting ability.
sentences.chinese: 滇西北的川滇高山櫟具有很強的萌生能力。

sentences.english: Yunnan province is briefly named Dian or Yun, with Kunming as its provincial seat.
sentences.chinese: 雲南省簡稱滇或者雲，省會城市昆明。

sentences.english: The Yuhucun Formation in NE Yunnan is an important horizon which hosts high-grade Pb-Zn deposit.
sentences.chinese: 漁戶村組爲滇東北富鉛鋅礦的重要產出層位。

sentences.english: The rock city Yanjin is a small county seat lies in the northeast of Yunnan .
sentences.chinese: 巖城鹽津是位於滇東北的一個小縣城。

sentences.english: The great difference existed in the florescence of P. delavayi among different plants.
sentences.chinese: 滇牡丹不同植株花期變異比較大。
